messages.title: Working Hard for Cardiff South and Penarth

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes NHS privatisation; introduced the Health and Social Services Bill.
Supports job creation and opposed to tax rises for working families.
Favors additional investment in schools and skills.
Against Conservative spending cuts, supports sustainable investments.

mentions.candidate: Vaughan Gething has secured millions for local health services, including a new Childrenâ€™s Hospital for Wales.

issues.health: Opposition to NHS privatisation and introduction of the Health and Social Services Bill.

leaflet.personalStatement: In Parliament I have worked hard for the people of Cardiff South and Penarth. A great deal has been achieved, but there is always more to do.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought for millions in local health service funding, including for a new Children's Hospital for Wales; introduced the Health and Social Services Bill.

endorsements.endorsement: Vaughan has been an effective voice for local people.

quotes.text: Vaughan has been an effective voice for local people.

images.caption: Vaughan Gething with constituents and in action.
